name: Transfiguration
description: Transfiguration follows the cycle of evolution through a figure who transforms through the elements, from lava and rock to diamonds and steam. Creatures born from the elements have long been part of screen culture.

constellations_primary.name: Transfiguration
constellations_primary.description: Transfiguration follows the cycle of evolution through a figure who transforms through the elements, from lava and rock to diamonds and steam. Creatures born from the elements have long been part of screen culture.

constellations_other.name: Hard sci-fi to cyberpunk
constellations_other.description: Ayoung Kim's practice has been inspired by 'hard' science fiction writers like Greg Egan. Recent sci-fi media using hard sci-fi can be connected back to the beginnings of cyberpunk, a sub-genre of sci-fi.

constellations_primary.name: Transfiguration

end.title: Moana
end.creator_credit: John Musker, Ron Clements, Chris Williams, Don Hall, Osnat Shurer, Hurwitz Creative, Walt Disney Animation Studios and Lisa Keane
end.brief_description: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by Maui reaches an impetuous Chieftain’s daughter’s island, she answers the Ocean’s call to seek out the demigod to set things right.

constellations_other.name: Little J & Big Cuz to Blade
constellations_other.description: Discover how some of the best indigenous works connect to comic book blockbusters and martial arts videogames.

constellations_other.name: Go Bang
constellations_other.description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.

constellations_other.name: Transfiguration
constellations_other.description: Transfiguration follows the cycle of evolution through a figure who transforms through the elements, from lava and rock to diamonds and steam. Creatures born from the elements have long been part of screen culture.

links.description: One of the most striking figures in Transfiguration is the lava form. In Disney’s Moana, Te Ka is a massive lava demon that Moana has to battle. The animation in Moana was assisted by Houdini, the program UE used for Transfiguration.

start.title: Moana
start.creator_credit: John Musker, Ron Clements, Chris Williams, Don Hall, Osnat Shurer, Hurwitz Creative, Walt Disney Animation Studios and Lisa Keane
start.brief_description: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by Maui reaches an impetuous Chieftain’s daughter’s island, she answers the Ocean’s call to seek out the demigod to set things right.

constellations_other.description: Discover how some of the best indigenous works connect to comic book blockbusters and martial arts videogames.

end.title: Frozen
end.brief_description: Princess Anna dreams of finding true love at her sister Elsa’s coronation before fate takes her on a dangerous journey in an attempt to end the eternal winter that has fallen over the kingdom.

constellations_other.name: Stop-motion and animation superstars
constellations_other.description: Despite the ease of new technology and a legacy going back to the beginning of cinema, stop-motion animation techniques are as popular as ever.

constellations_other.name: Transfiguration
constellations_other.description: Transfiguration follows the cycle of evolution through a figure who transforms through the elements, from lava and rock to diamonds and steam. Creatures born from the elements have long been part of screen culture.

links.description: To create snow in Frozen, the VFX team created a program called Matterhorne. They adapted it for water in Moana, calling it Splash. Frozen also has elemental creatures made from snow.

constellations_primary.name: Transfiguration

end.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
end.creator_credit: Jon Watts, Anna B. Sheppard, Dan Lebental, Leigh Folsom Boyd, Amy Pascal, Kevin Feige, Columbia Pictures, Marvel Studios, Pascal Pictures, Claude Paré, Erik Sommers, Andy Martinez Calzadilla, Hiroshi Mori and Chris McKenna
end.brief_description: Peter Parker and his friends go on a summer trip to Europe. However, they will hardly be able to rest - Peter will have to agree to help Nick Fury uncover the mystery of creatures that cause natural disasters and destruction throughout the continent.

constellations_other.name: Transfiguration
constellations_other.description: Transfiguration follows the cycle of evolution through a figure who transforms through the elements, from lava and rock to diamonds and steam. Creatures born from the elements have long been part of screen culture.

links.description: In the beginning of Spider-Man: Far From Home, Spider-Man must fight huge elemental monsters that take on similar forms as those that appear in Transfiguration, including wind, fire, earth and water.

start.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
start.creator_credit: Jon Watts, Anna B. Sheppard, Dan Lebental, Leigh Folsom Boyd, Amy Pascal, Kevin Feige, Columbia Pictures, Marvel Studios, Pascal Pictures, Claude Paré, Erik Sommers, Andy Martinez Calzadilla, Hiroshi Mori and Chris McKenna
start.brief_description: Peter Parker and his friends go on a summer trip to Europe. However, they will hardly be able to rest - Peter will have to agree to help Nick Fury uncover the mystery of creatures that cause natural disasters and destruction throughout the continent.

end.title: Elemental
end.creator_credit: Peter Sohn, Stephen Schaffer, Denise Ream, Pixar, Walt Disney Pictures, Don Shank, Brenda Hsueh, John Hoberg and Kat Likkel
end.brief_description: In a city where fire, water, land and air residents live together, a fiery young woman and a go-with-the-flow guy will discover something elemental: how much they have in common.

constellations_other.name: Transfiguration
constellations_other.description: Transfiguration follows the cycle of evolution through a figure who transforms through the elements, from lava and rock to diamonds and steam. Creatures born from the elements have long been part of screen culture.

links.description: The elemental characters in Disney’s 2023 animated movie Elemental are not nearly as ferocious as the ones in Spider-Man, which follows the budding romance of anthropomorphised water and fire elements.

constellations_primary.name: Transfiguration
constellations_primary.description: Transfiguration follows the cycle of evolution through a figure who transforms through the elements, from lava and rock to diamonds and steam. Creatures born from the elements have long been part of screen culture.

constellations_other.name: Hard sci-fi to cyberpunk
constellations_other.description: Ayoung Kim's practice has been inspired by 'hard' science fiction writers like Greg Egan. Recent sci-fi media using hard sci-fi can be connected back to the beginnings of cyberpunk, a sub-genre of sci-fi.

end.title: Hollow Knight
end.brief_description: Hollow Knight is an award-winning platforming game developed by Australian indie studio Team Cherry.

constellations_primary.name: Silent adventures (Hollow Knight - Education)
constellations_primary.description: Videogames, film and TV usually rely on the spoken word to communicate character and story. It wasn’t always this way. Although we may think of ‘silent films’ as in the past, there are contemporary videogames and films that shy away from using the spoken word.

constellations_other.name: Creepy crawlies onscreen
constellations_other.description: This constellation celebrates creepy crawlies on screen, whether they are benevolent heroes like Buddy the spider of Sbug Games’ Webbed (2019), inscrutable arthropods, or arachnid villains.

constellations_other.name: Transfiguration
constellations_other.description: Transfiguration follows the cycle of evolution through a figure who transforms through the elements, from lava and rock to diamonds and steam. Creatures born from the elements have long been part of screen culture.

links.description: At one stage in its cycle, the being in Transfiguration takes on a diamond form. In Hollow Knight, there are bug enemies with gems sticking out of them and crystal crawlers in the Crystal Peak level.

start.title: Hollow Knight
start.brief_description: Hollow Knight is an award-winning platforming game developed by Australian indie studio Team Cherry.

constellations_primary.name: Silent adventures (Hollow Knight - Education)
constellations_primary.description: Videogames, film and TV usually rely on the spoken word to communicate character and story. It wasn’t always this way. Although we may think of ‘silent films’ as in the past, there are contemporary videogames and films that shy away from using the spoken word.

end.title: RuneScape
end.brief_description: RuneScape is a high fantasy open world MMORPG. Explore an ever changing and evolving living world where new challenges, skills, and quests await. Featuring unprecedented player freedom, you choose how to play, adventure, and grow.

constellations_other.name: Transfiguration
constellations_other.description: Transfiguration follows the cycle of evolution through a figure who transforms through the elements, from lava and rock to diamonds and steam. Creatures born from the elements have long been part of screen culture.

links.description: Similar to Hollow Knight, RuneScape features a character who is made from crystal – in this case, the elf goddess Seren actually is a living crystal.
